name: furniture-shopping-app-root-shim
description: Root-level shim for preview runners that insist on npm. Proxies to BackendAPI/start.sh.

scripts.start: echo "[Root npm shim] Proxying to BackendAPI/start.sh (working dir: $(pwd))" && cd BackendAPI && bash start.sh
scripts.start:dev: echo "[Root npm shim] Proxying to BackendAPI/start.sh (working dir: $(pwd))" && cd BackendAPI && bash start.sh
